features: 2 in 1 Formula: This Eucerin dry skin cream is a 2 in 1 formula that moisturizes dry skin while helping protect from sun exposure
Sunscreen Cream: Daily Hydration Eucerin moisturizer with SPF 30 Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB protection helps defend against sunburn and long-term skin damage when used as directed
Enriched Body Cream: This Eucerin cream is enriched with Sunflower Oil and Pro-Vitamin B5, and is fast absorbing and non-greasy
Sensitive Skin Safe: Eucerin Daily Hydration fragrance free body cream is dye free and is safe for sensitive skin, perfect as a very dry skin cream
Includes one (1) 8 ounce tube of Eucerin Daily Hydration Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen Body Cream
body.description: Eucerin Daily Hydration Cream SPF 30 provides 24 hour moisture to dry skin while protecting it from sunburn and long-term skin damage with Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB protection. UV light is the main cause of sun-induced skin damage and a major risk factor for most skin cancers. This fast-absorbing skin cream for dry skin is non-greasy, and is enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5 and Sunflower Oil. This Eucerin body cream for dry skin is a lightweight 2 in 1 moisturizer and Broad Spectrum sunscreen that is fragrance free and dye free, and is safe for sensitive skin. This body moisturizer is perfect for those looking for a dry skin body cream that also helps protect skin from sunburn and long-term skin damage when used as directed. For sunscreen use, apply this Eucerin sunscreen cream liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Eucerin is a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand that is based on an uncompromising approach to science. With skin care products designed to restore and sustain healthy-looking skin, families everywhere look to Eucerin to enhance outer beauty and self-confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eucerin Daily Hydration Skincare Daily Cream with SPF 30 Add to Cart Daily Hydrating Lotion Add to Cart Daily Lotion with SPF 15 Add to Cart Daily Gel Cream Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 9,166 4.8 out of 5 stars 3,713 4.7 out of 5 stars 3,037 4.7 out of 5 stars 110 Price $7.69$7.69 $37.85$37.85 $38.91$38.91 $11.79$11.79 Form Cream Lotion Lotion Gel Cream Application Whole Body Whole Body Whole Body Whole Body Skin Type Dry Skin Dry Skin Dry Skin Dry Skin Key Ingredient Sunflower Oil & Pro-Vitamin B5 Pro-Vitamin B5 Sunflower Oil & Pro-Vitamin B5 Sunflower Oil & Pro-Vitamin B5 Fragrance Free Yes Yes Yes Yes SPF 30 N/A 15 N/A

Is this cream lightweight enough to be used on my face? This Eucerin cream is not formulated or tested for facial use. We recommend our Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 for the face. Is this safe for sensitive skin types? Yes, Eucerin products are formulated for sensitive skin as they are fragrance-free. We list all ingredients on the product and suggest that you try new products on a small area to be sure you don't have any sensitivities. We hope you enjoy! Can it be used on children's skin? The Eucerin Daily Hydration Body Cream SPF 30 sunscreen may be used on children older than two years of age. We recommend that you ask your doctor regarding use of this dry skin cream on children under 2 years of age. How is this with make up? Is it matte? Greasy? This Eucerin sunscreen cream is a great daily moisturizer for the body. We have not specifically tested it for use on the face. You may want to consider the Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion SPF 30 which won't clog pores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and no scent
reviews.reviewText: I'm glad to have found a daily moisturizer with spf that I like. I've tried some others (Hempz and Aveno) but the fragrance was too much. This one is totally unscented which is great. As a moisturizer it is quite thick and creamy, but absorbs well and doesn't feel greasy or sticky. Excellent product, which I'd bought it before the others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the dedicated sunscreen products I’ve used
reviews.reviewText: Am a new user and instant fan of this lotion. It disappears, moisturizes, doesn’t transfer, and does a great job at protecting my skin. Recently went on an afternoon boat tour in the blazing sun, and was worried since I hadn’t reapplied since the early morning. No burn! I was really pleased at how long lasting it was. I'm throwing away my other products. No reaction from my sensitive skin, and compared to other sunscreen products this has a really pleasant and subtle scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to face and hand cream
reviews.reviewText: This has been my go to face and hand cream for several years. Use it for the sun / UV protection and moisturizing. Not greasy. Hard to find a moisturizing cream with sun screen, at a reasonable price. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I personally love this brand, so I was excited to see that they had a moisturizer with high enough SPF production to use during the day. Goes on pretty smoothly tho a little bit thick so I used only for my body and not my face. It’s not meant to be waterproof, so would not recommend for beach days, but perfect for every day use during the summer. Would give it 5 stars if it was easier to apply for face without too thick feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very effective and very moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: My skin gets very moisturized after using Eucerin w/ SPF. It doesn’t smell weird and it’s very effective on my sensitive skin. I love the size and quality of this product and have been using it for many years now. I use it all the time to protect my skin from the sun and heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Includes sun screen
reviews.reviewText: It moisturizes your skin and protects at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday SPF lotion
reviews.reviewText: It’s hard to find an affordable daily spf body lotion, but this one does the trick. It’s pretty thick but rubs in super easy and does not feel greasy at all. Once it’s rubbed in, I can’t even tell I put it on (besides feeling moisturized ☺️). Doesn’t leave a white cast either.It does smell a little like sunscreen, which I don’t love. But the smell doesn’t linger much at all when you put it on so you won’t smell like sunscreen all day!I’ve used the whole tube and am about to order another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So moisturizing love it for my face AND body , it quite thick but I don’t mind it , would recommend this for oily skin def for combo and dry skin. It can be kinda greasy looking but I don’t mind it I like the dewy look.It last long without drying out the skin, and REALLY big amount for such cheap price like wow. But it can be a little more clogging when not clean off well be mindful on that but would 10/10 buy again

reviews.reviewerName: Me gustó, es un buen producto, se difumina muy fácil y el tono me quedo muy bien!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Great for sensitive skin, hydrating, relatively lightweight, moisturiser and sunscreen
reviews.reviewText: SPF 30, very hydrating, leaves my skin soft and plump, not greasy or sticky, no aggressive fragrance ❤️, not water resistant (in case that’s important to you), didn’t aggravate my sensitive skin like many other sunscreens 👍 Saves you money as it’s a two in one sunscreen and moisturiser and is a great price for the quality 🤩
The texture is good but it's a little thick so best suited for dry and normal skin. If this was 500 cheaper, I would give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice sunblock but too rich for hot weather
reviews.reviewText: Pretty nice sunblock but I find it too rich to put on face in hot weather. For cold weather it will be a gd moisturizer+ sunblock. Now using as body sunblock if not going out under the sun for long. Definatly worth to buy since is such big bottle. It will be great if it is SPF 50. 😊
